verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H561>words<s%>, And lay <S%H6845>up<s%> my commandments with <S%H4687>thee<s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%>; And my <S%H8451>law<s%> as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eye<s%>.
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them upon thy <S%H676>fingers<s%>; <S%H3789>Write<s%> them upon the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, Thou art my <S%H269>sister<s%>; And <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> thy <S%H4129>kinswoman<s%>:
That they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, From the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> that <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> with her <S%H561>words<s%>.
For at the <S%H2474>window<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> I <S%H8259>looked<s%> forth through my <S%H822>lattice<s%>;
And I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> among the simple <S%H6612>ones<s%>, I <S%H995>discerned<s%> among the <S%H1121>youths<s%>, A young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>,
Passing <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H7784>street<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> her <S%H6434>corner<s%>; And he <S%H6805>went<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to her <S%H1004>house<s%>,
In the <S%H5399>twilight<s%>, in the <S%H3117>evening<s%> of the <S%H380>day<s%>, In the middle of the <S%H3915>night<s%> and in the <S%H653>darkness<s%>.
And <S%H7125><s%>, behold, there met him a <S%H802>woman<s%> With the <S%H7897>attire<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and <S%H5341>wily<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
(She is <S%H1993>clamorous<s%> and <S%H5637>wilful<s%>; Her <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7931>abide<s%> not in her <S%H1004>house<s%>:
Now <S%H6471><s%> she is in the <S%H7339>streets<s%>, <S%H6471>now<s%> in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> <S%H693>places<s%>, And lieth in wait <S%H681>at<s%> every <S%H6438>corner<s%>.)
So she <S%H2388>caught<s%> <S%H5401>him<s%>, and kissed <S%H5810>him<s%>, And with an impudent <S%H6440>face<s%> she said unto <S%H559>him<s%>:
Sacrifices <S%H8002><s%> of <S%H2077>peace-offerings<s%> are with <S%H3117>me<s%>; This day have I <S%H7999>paid<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%>.
Therefore came I <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7836>thee<s%>, Diligently to seek thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, and I have found <S%H4672>thee<s%>.
I have <S%H7234>spread<s%> my <S%H6210>couch<s%> with <S%H4765>carpets<s%> of <S%H2405>tapestry<s%>, With striped cloths of the <S%H330>yarn<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
I have <S%H5130>perfumed<s%> my <S%H4904>bed<s%> With <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, <S%H174>aloes<s%>, and <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%>.
Come <S%H3212><s%>, let us take our <S%H7301>fill<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; Let us <S%H5965>solace<s%> ourselves with <S%H159>loves<s%>.
For the <S%H376>man<s%> is not at <S%H1004>home<s%>; He is <S%H1980>gone<s%> a <S%H7350>long<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%>:
He hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H6872>bag<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%>; He will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> at the <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H3677>moon<s%>.
With her <S%H7230>much<s%> fair <S%H3948>speech<s%> she causeth him to <S%H5186>yield<s%>; With the <S%H2506>flattering<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> she forceth him <S%H5080>along<s%>.

He <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her <S%H6597>straightway<s%>, As an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H935>goeth<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>, Or as one in <S%H5914>fetters<s%> to the <S%H4148>correction<s%> of the <S%H191>fool<s%>;

Till an <S%H2671>arrow<s%> <S%H6398>strike<s%> through his <S%H3516>liver<s%>; As a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H4116>hasteth<s%> to the <S%H6341>snare<s%>, And <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not that it is for his <S%H5315>life<s%>.
Now <S%H1121>therefore<s%>, my sons, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H7181>me<s%>, And attend to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Let not thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7847>decline<s%> to her <S%H1870>ways<s%>; Go not <S%H8582>astray<s%> in her <S%H5410>paths<s%>.
For she hath cast <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>wounded<s%>: <S%H2026>Yea<s%>, all her slain are a mighty <S%H6099>host<s%>.
Her <S%H1004>house<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, Going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
